title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About The Watermelon Mustard Eating Situation With Special Guest Hillary! (Week of 5/31)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About The Watermelon Mustard Eating Situation With Special Guest Hillary! (Week of 5/31)
description:
This edition of the podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. This week Morgan talks with Hillary about nostalgic moments with artists and foods, dreams they wish they would have chased, and the latest in their dating lives. Plus they add commentary on Bobby’s Bachelor Party, 3 Doors Down, Elder vs. Millennial and Parker McCollum.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
